metadata.name: 岩屋の主と宇田の姫
metadata.description:
The main character is named "HANA-NO-OMOTO-HIME".
She  is pregnant with a child by a man who visits her every night.
However, the identity of the man is unknown.
One day, She sewed a ball of thread onto the man's collar with a needle. 

The next morning, she followed the unraveled thread and found a large cave.
She calls out to the cave, and the owner of the cave comes out.
But it was not the man, but a giant serpent. The serpent had a needle stuck in its throat.

This is one of the intermarriage tales in Japan.

How did the princess feel when she saw the man's true identity?
Joy or sorrow? Fear or anger?
I was strongly inspired by the sentimentalism and the romanticism of their mutual connection.
I created the image I drew in my mind in 3DCG.

4093 x 2894 PNG
